title.label: It‚Äôs a fun game but a bit of a concern,

content.label: I like this game, it‚Äôs good, but I am not making enough money easily because I have to waste them on contracts and I can‚Äôt find an easier way to earn a lot of money quick. Is there a way I can earn more money quickly, sponsors and Free cash take a bit of time though.

Played great at first, lasted about a week, spent a couple of dollars on games then game keeps crashing.  My frustration is why works great for a week then decides to keep crashing and especially after you spend money on game. Beware of spending money

name.label: Love F1 but hate this game

content.label:
Fun game with a need for some good strategizing.
Most bugs seem to have been fixed, though I still occasionally see cars going off track, acting erratically, etc.
My only real requests are that more car liveries and maybe the option for more customization instead of just pre-made liveries.
That and my banner motto needs more süÖ±Ô∏èinnala.
Still having problems with the game not loading still hasnt been fixed:((

This is a very attractive game of course. I am playing it since around 2 weeks . I reached tier 5 and collected over 54 millions in such a short time 
BUT, I cant enter any more  because each time it said unable to find match, please try again . I asked my friends and they said , yes it occurs at tier 5 with fast growing players  . May question is ? Is this intended to force us to purchase the game ?
So far so good In liking this game since I‚Äôm playing it for the first time.
I love it it‚Äôs very good for people to play

Ok look this is a amazing game but if you guys make another game like Motorsport Manager 4 or something keep the same concept like online and have your own season and customize characters like 3 and put them together that is it.
I use this on iPhone and I tried to load this 5 different times and it kept crashing on the loading screen.. 0/5 stars
Except game, this is new order!!!!!

Game was fun to play but since early may it won‚Äôt load or open at all. What a waste. Don‚Äôt download this garbage. Wouldn‚Äôt suggest getting the version now that‚Äôs $5.99. It would be a waste of $$$

title.label: Not terrible but too many connection bugs for an online only game

content.label: The game itself isn‚Äôt terrible but the connection issues mean i don‚Äôt even bother playing for certain parts of the day. This being an online only game you would think the developers would make that a priority.

The game is fun but you will get to the point where you do not have enough money to pay for race or your driver. Even if you pay to buy in game credits, you‚Äôll run out and you won‚Äôt be able to pay for anything once again. The economics are unsustainable.

I think I can agree with the reviews of several other people who have made the mistake of playing this game. I‚Äôve only had it for a few days now and I‚Äôm already deleting it, here‚Äôs why: 

1. The rewards for racing are mediocre at best. Races also glitch out a lot which often causes you to lose the race, sometimes ALL the cars on a section of the track to veer completely off the track causing most of these people to lose their place.

 2. Drivers cost way too much, and the more you upgrade a driver the more they cost. And of course you can‚Äôt race with only one driver, so if one of your drivers contract expires you can‚Äôt race until you either renew their contract or find a new driver, and if you can‚Äôt afford to renew your predominantly unskilled (yet surprisingly demanding) drivers contract, then that means your just going to have to settle with a driver who can barely stay in any significant pole position. 

For these reasons, I did not enjoy the game for longer than a day, and I don‚Äôt think you will either.
Things started out great for about a week.  Now the game crashes at the loading screen every single time.
Solid game that had one issue with matchmaking. Now they‚Äôve fixed the matchmaking with an update but the app crashes often.

So I wanted to connect my phone account to my iPad. My iPad had me make a new account to start. Now my phone account has my freshly started iPad account. Contacted customer service multiple times and the only response I have received is that they‚Äôre having server issues.

Huge bummer because MM Mobile 3 was awesome and this just seems to be a way to swindle more money.

Still fun so I hope Playsport sees this and helps my issue.

What an enjoyable game and quite addictive.  More complex and in depth than I originally anticipated. It would be helpful to have some explanation on what certain areas of increase would do such as engine type, suspension, brakes, but over all quite fun.
Overall good game but have to keep paying just to play. You don‚Äôt need to nickel and dime your players.

title.label: I dont know why stock cars race against formula cars but ok

content.label: Yep

Used to love this game and it was awesome at first feeling like you‚Äôre kind of running your own motor sports team but that fun is short lived when you quick advance through the leagues and now it‚Äôs basically pay to play and because I refuse to funnel a couple bucks into this horrible app everyday I can no longer play because I can‚Äôt afford to pay my drivers or the up keep of my staff/facilities. Save your time and possible money waiting until they make this game subscription or something

To me the game is good but a few flaws are aggravating such as the cars on the track can be passing in the turns an it skips an suddenly you lost that position an possibly about to or have lost another. Able to update the cars could be some better while there are plenty of options building parts like the last MM game to me was easier to navigate.
All the time the game doesnt wortk and appears a message restart the game or a message saying many people playing so you can t play!How do you launch a game that doesn t work most of the time ?

So I downloaded this game about 2 weeks ago now, and I‚Äôve been having EXTREME amounts of fun, and wins of course, but lately(today April 29th, 2020 mainly) EVERY SINGLE TIME that I try to race or load into a race, I get the ‚ÄúUnable To Find Match, Please Try Again, Restart‚Äù pop-up. It‚Äôs literally EVERY SINGLE TIME, without fail! Usually it would happen every 10-12 races, but now it‚Äôs EVERY SINGLE ONE! I have deleted, redownloaded, and linked my FB account back up to it about 3-4 times now and it‚Äôs still doing it. I have the latest version, of course, so I‚Äôm trying to see what‚Äôs wrong! Can ANYONE please tell me how to fix this or is all of my hard work and progression just gone? Thankfully I haven‚Äôt spent any money on this game yet, but I was very close to though. Right now sadly, I‚Äôm guessing that I‚Äôll just have to move on from this one and purchase MM2 and MM3 in order to be able to play the game again and have fun with it. I have screenshots on top of screenshots, if the devs need proof of anything. Please can someone help me try to fix this issue. This is one of the only games that I enjoy playing while we‚Äôre stuck in this quarantine.

title.label: Fun, when you actually get to play

content.label: Too many problems that make this unplayable. I joined VIP for the month because it was fun at the start. Now between excessive load time just to get in the game, then when I join a game many, many times it kicks me after I wait to join. Then I have to try again and get kicked again. After a few minutes doing this I just stop and try again later or tomorrow.

This is a great game, highlights the strategic portions of Motorsport racing. However, my only issue with it now is that it was working fine for the first 3 week I had it down loaded, but then suddenly it won‚Äôt let me race. It‚Äôll have me a message saying ‚Äúno matcha found‚Äù when there are other people in there and more than enough players online. It‚Äôs done this about 12 times now within the past 10 mins of this post.
Reminds me of the spec mode on gran turismo.not sure how i didnt come across this game before

There is a bunch of easy ways to level up through the typical ads for in-game money and it lets you really get through all of the game without having thr typical ads in your face you see in other apps. 10/10 recommend to a friend.

Very grindy as you increase levels races don‚Äôt pay enough for your wins.  Game crashes when trying to get into a race literally 5/10 attempts.   A real shame because the game play is pretty good and you can be competitive without spending $

title.label: I have a big beef with this App

content.label:
You guys need seriously need more servers! I spend more time not getting into a race than racing, because I have to restart the app EVERY TIME after getting a ‚Äú high activity‚Äù message after entering a race. This happens when there‚Äôs 8,000 players or 15,000 players. 
This baffles me, since when does an app literally complain that there‚Äôs too much activity?? It‚Äôs backwards, I would expect a message for ‚ÄúLack of activity‚Äù, NOT high activity! 
No complaints about anything else, just Fix that and the game would be perfect.

title.label: Unable to find match !!! For hrs not possible to play

content.label: I let the support team know about the problem, but no answer. Not fixed at all, means they don‚Äôt care. Could be a good, not great game. Spent some money on it, but absolutely not worth it.

title.label: Is failing to join races over and over again

content.label: Connection problems is restarting and restarting because can not join races
Super awesome game very time consuming all I ever wanted get to go fast n watch from above

Having issues joining games. It says high volume of players but never joins a race. Please fix. Ty. Also finding myself running out of in game currency and in order to play I have to spend real money. Pay to win is one thing but pay to play is another.

Excessive loading screens and constant lag in races, if I even get that far, are absolutely terrible. The servers that you use need updated or upgraded. Difficult to enjoy. Too much emphasis on graphics than actual substance. Seasons and Tiers make no sense in terms of leveling. The tiers should be based of experience and quality like in previous games not on races completed. There‚Äôs no point in having tiers if a team can leave after 3 races or so. There seems to be no understanding about how FIA conducts its leagues and also driver progressions within them. The game is called Motorsport Manager not Mix and Match Car Simulator. The live time screen is rarely used if at all and also the tire selection screen mid race is more like an intermission than a pit stop. Car stats make no sense in terms of how it works. Please improve!!!!! Great idea for online but needs a lot of work. Please don‚Äôt be like other money grabbing companies. Oh and unable to find a match happens way too much!!!! Fix this!!!! Can I get a response????
Loaded the game and tried opening it. Before it opens it cuts me off. Tried several times and still not able to play. Update your servers please, it looks like an interesting game.
This game was fun until it started crashing every time I tried racing...

It‚Äôs impossible to play day/night.  Constantly restating, I spend more time restarting the app then playing.  I had previously given a two star in hopes this would get resolved.  I see it does not matter what we think...

This game would have gotten 5 stars if it weren‚Äôt for the fact that the servers are literal garbage. Half the time I get kicked out of a race! If it can even find me a match. Not to mention the fact that the even using the menu is too ouch for the server to handle

Stuck forever on a screen telling you to wait due to high player activity. Every single day.

Update the servers!!

Love the game and have progressed well. Unfortunately it seems now all I am able to do is view ads because the servers are not prepared to support the demand for game play. At least 7 of 10 attempts to race come back unable to find match, causing the game to reload. Each time this happens is about a 2 minute process, all those failed attempts begin to add up in considerable amounts of lost time. This has been an ongoing issue form for the last couple weeks with the experience getting considerably worse the past week. Looking at other feedback, I am not alone and it appears Playsport doesn‚Äôt care because they do not respond.
Game is okay when you can enter a race, but it‚Äôs always ‚Äútoo busy‚Äù. I tried contacting them, but they don‚Äôt respond.

This would be a great game. It seems though that the servers can‚Äôt keep up with demand. Always crashing or says there are too many people online. If they unfixed this it would be a 5 star game for sure.

You can spend many minutes trying to start a race, then kicks you off.  While it refunds your money for the race, sometimes the races just won‚Äôt load and eventually you just give up trying.  Driver stats don‚Äôt really seem to mean anything, as I‚Äôve got a driver with very high stats and a 2 driver with very low stats, and they tend to finish at randomly close intervals, with the low driver sometimes higher than the other. 

As others have said, some game hackers have higher tier drivers and strategies that shouldn‚Äôt belong on the Tier you‚Äôre on.  Sometimes cars will drive WAAAY off the track.  Interesting concept that the cars can drive through buildings!
Loved the game but as more people have started playing I get a constant message saying to many people are online and when I go to start a race it kicks me out saying unable to find a room.

title.label: I thought Playsport Games stood for something

content.label: If you‚Äôre used to their past games than this one will come as a shock to you. The same greedy and manipulative techniques that games like clash of clans and others use are also present here. Waiting on parts to finish and aggressive monetization will pommel you into the ground. I‚Äôm really let down by ‚ÄúPaysports Games‚Äù as they stoop to an embarrassing low. I never thought I‚Äôd say this but I‚Äôm so glad that they are not working on the officially licensed PC version of F1 Manager game that‚Äôs due to real ease sometime in 2022. If the developer is reading this, please reconsider your future games‚Äô monetization strategy because after all, the more aggressive your monetization is set to the faster you‚Äôll wear out your tires.

title.label: Keeps crashing and requesting a restart

content.label: Every time I‚Äôve tried to enter a career races it has kicked me out and restarted.

title.label: Pretty decent, but definitely needs improvement!

content.label:
The game is fun. Logical. Requires thinking. 

No one cares about the good stuff. Here is something bad: 

Going thru Tier 1 to 4 is extremely easy. Tier 5 is fun. Tier 6 is hell because players don‚Äôt get enough materials to upgrade their cars so Tier 6 is spent in struggle for materials. 

Good players would finish each championships with less powerful cars (because they play less races for more points to advance, so less materials to upgrade), without upgrading to max levels for each championship. This is a problem because the car level would lag behind average championship‚Äôs car levels farther and farther eventually become unplayable. The good player will always be at a disadvantage. 

This can be fixed by rewarding players with each level‚Äôs max spec parts, so the player enters the next championship without too much of a disadvantage. 

Money in game is not enough. The drivers would cost more and more. The farther you progress in the game, the better the driver you would need to continue. Better drivers cost more. So it costs more to play in the later sessions of the game. 

BUT, the reward doesn‚Äôt increase!!! For a tier 5 win you earn 1 million. For a tier 7 win, which is considerably harder to win, thus requires better drivers, winning prize is still 1 mil!!! Despite the fact that you need much much better drivers to play at tier 7 who would cost a lot more. I‚Äôm making -28K per race right now in tier 7. The only place to get more money is watching ads and sponsors in game which gives not nearly enough money for anything. Or spent real money. 

Improve the game!
a great racing strategy game...

First off this is coming from someone that had been playing since mm1. To begin, the first three days are a quality time; racing, winning, feeling like a Motorsport manager. THEN it begins, from here you have two options. Either pay from a dollar to 10 dollars a  day just to keep up with maintaining your racers, staff, vehicle, etc. Then theres the second option, you stop playing entirely, log in and watch ads when youre able or allowed to, then after two weeks hopefully you can buy ONE PART. On top of that, even if you chose option A, the game has been shut down for two weeks unable to accommodate for players they one day hoped of having. Which means option A and B are thrown out the window and youre now waiting for a junk broken game to hopefully revive and the time you have spent NOT be wasted forever! This is not meantioning the racing bugs, driver bugs, unreal cost to keep your ‚Äúteam‚Äù running youre forced to pay 2 play and thenthe game shuts off. JUNK NEVER BUY DONT EVEN BUY THE NEXT VERSION....

Ps they get 1 star because thats the lowest you can go
